detail_desc: Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and covered heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Baby Exclusive. Swimsuit in UV-protective material with short sleeves and a zip down the front. Lined. UPF 50.
Beret in a fine-knit wool blend.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with a round neck, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Stud earrings in various colours and materials.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft viscose and lyocell twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and fly with a button. Front pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Hoodie in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with a high collar, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed waistband and mesh sections on the legs. Integral key pocket in the waistband.

Short beach dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck front and back with a crocheted lace trim, horizontal, tasselled straps at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Suit trousers in a wool weave with a regular waist, extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and wide, straight legs.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.

Padded jacket in a water-repellent weave with a padded, detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Reflective details. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
Short, A-line skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets.
Short 5-pocket skirt in stretch twill with a zip fly and button. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in textured jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Blouse in silk satin with a V-neck and wide ties at the top. Long sleeves with wide cuffs with a covered button, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Top in soft jersey made from merino wool with extra-long sleeves. Visible seams down the back and sleeves.
V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a sturdy weave with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a detachable tie belt with metal D-rings. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded jersey tongue, shimmering metallic heel caps and a patent back section. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined drawstring hood with a ribbed trim. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wrapover blouse in an airy jacquard weave with short, raglan puff sleeves, ties at one side and a flared peplum. Lined.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Shopper in grained imitation leather with a matching clutch bag (not detachable). The shopper has two handles at the top, each covered with a satin scarf, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a magnetic fastening. Unlined. Size 20x30x27 cm.
Dress in stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem.

Straight-cut shirt in soft denim made from a linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, a gently tapered waist, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Concealed zip in the side and at the back, seam at the waist and cut-out section at the back. Lined.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Imitation leather shopper with two handles at the top, a shoulder strap and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Unlined. Size 13x29x33 cm.
Canvas trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles with a braided jute trim. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Platform 4 cm.
Kids Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with frill-trimmed, elasticated shoulder straps and a wrapover front with flounces at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounced trim at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved, V-neck blouse in a linen weave with a wrapover front with diagonal buttoning, a tie at one side and a flounced hem.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, straight-cut hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and soft mesh inner shorts with a key pocket.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lacing at the sides.
Short-sleeved, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Cropped off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, a flounce with an overlocked edge at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long bandeau dress in an airy weave with draping and a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the bodice. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Calf-length culottes in a linen and cotton weave. Regular waist with covered elastication at the back, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length wrapover skirt in a viscose weave with flounce-trimmed edges and an adjustable tie belt at the waist. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in woven fabric with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems with a frill trim.
Short-sleeved shirt in a viscose weave with a resort collar, French front, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Real side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs that flare gently at the hem. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads with a fabric band with a small metal decoration. Width of brim 3.5 cm. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Soft, non-wired bra in velvet and lace with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, wide elastic trim at the hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Calf-length, A-line, wrapover skirt in soft leather with metal press-stud fastenings. Visible seam at the back, an opening at the front and raw edges. Lined at the top.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short, wrapover skirt in a sturdy cotton weave with a pleated front and adjustable, imitation leather tabs with metal fasteners. Raw-edge hem.
Short dress in patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in an airy organic cotton weave with a yoke, short, frilled sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and wide sides.
